items.title: kenemA GRAD
content:
Today, we proudly inaugurated the #Kenema_Pharmacy_Management_System, a comprehensive digital solution designed to modernize and integrate pharmacy operations across our network. The inauguration ceremony was honored by the presence of high-level officials from the Addis Ababa City Council, representatives of health associations, pharmaceutical manufacturers and suppliers, banking institutions, and technology experts.
This milestone marks a significant step forward in strengthening efficiency, transparency, and service quality within the pharmaceutical sector. The system is expected to enhance inventory management, financial control, regulatory compliance, and data-driven decision-making, ultimately improving access to safe, affordable, and reliable medicines for the public.
The launch reflects our strong commitment to digital transformation and cross-sector collaboration, bringing together public institutions, private partners, and technology leaders to support a sustainable and modern healthcare ecosystem in Addis Ababa.
Thank you everyone who engaged and part of these activities!
